title: Sweet and sour gammon and pineapple
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '600g cooked and cubed gammon', '2 spring onions, chopped', '250g pineapple chunks, drained', '300ml pineapple juice', '4 teaspoons cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons soft brown sugar', '2 teaspoons prepared mustard', '2 tablespoons cornflour']
